title: Welcome to Your Advent Calendar!
text: Hey Brionskiii! Welcome to your personalized advent calendar! I've prepared 25 days of surprises, laughs, and memories just for you. Open a new door each day and let's count down to Christmas together. Hope you stick around until day 25!

title: Please Keep This LEGO Minifigure
text: I entrusted this to you.
care:
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━
 Care Instructions 
━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

 Do not drop
 Do not step on
 Do not give caffeine after 9 PM

title: Countdown
text: Congrats nothing happened. Thank you for today!

title: A Song That Reminds Me of You
text: No questions asked. Just because. Listen below:

title: Fun Fact
text: Ang penguin daw kapag nalungkot, nagba-bounce para gumaan loob niya.

title: Opposite Card
text:
Send me a link of a song that reminds you of me.

If I don't receive anything, you owe me a drink!

title: Reverse Psych
text: Don't be productive today. Rebel by resting 20 minutes.

title: Self-Care Prompt
text: One small kindness: drink water and take 3 slow breaths before opening your notes.

title: Word of Affirmation
text: You are stronger than you think, and your kindness brightens everyone's day.

title: Tiny Life Hack
text: To improve productivity, stare at nothing for 10 seconds.

title: Important Announcement
text:
╔═════════════════════════════════════════╗
║                                         ║
║         OFFICIAL NOTICE                 ║
║                                         ║
╠═════════════════════════════════════════╣
║                                         
 ATTENTION: You are required to smile   
  today. Compliance optional but noted.  
                                        
  Send a picture to me for proof.        
                                         ║
╚═════════════════════════════════════════╝

title: Drinks on ME
text: Congratulations may kape ka sa akin!

title: Save this Lucky 1x1 picture of me!
text: Keep this for good luck!

title: Wrong Advice of the Day
text: If you can't convince them, confuse them.

title: What If?
text: What if your life was narrated by Mickey Mouse? Every moment: 'Oh boy! Here we go again!' Hot dog!

title: Useless Horoscope
text: Today you will walk. Maybe.

title: Useless Tutorial
text:
Tutorial: How to Blink

Step 1: Look
Step 2: Close
Step 3: Open

You're welcome.

title: Pick a Random Box
text:
Select ONE box for your prize!

 You can only choose once. Choose wisely!

Screenshot what you got and send it to me.

title: Favorite Picture of Us
text: This is my favorite picture of us together!

title: Safe Person
text: Thank you for being my safe person.

title: Soft Reminder
text: You can unload anything on me today. Today only!

title: Dare
text: Share your favorite memory with me. It can be funny, sweet, or random. If I don’t get a message before Christmas, you owe me chicken.
